Question: "That happened because this person was a team player, he always worked on behalf of the team.".
Hints: On May 6, 1968, about 100 feet (30 m) above the ground, this person's controls started to degrade and the LLTV began banking.
The following year, the ____s welcomed their third child, son Mark.
In May 2005, this person became involved in an unusual legal battle with his barber of 20 years, Marx Sizemore.
